options.option-description: Use the class .alert-success for a success alert box. This alert box indicates a successful or positive action.
options.alert-message: Thank you for submitting your details. If you have any questions please email itservicedesk@st-andrews.ac.uk.

options.option-description: Use the class alert-info for an info alert box. This alert box indicates a neutral informative change or action.
options.alert-message: Heads up! We recommend that you apply soon for a place on our poetry course.

options.option-description: Use the class alert-warning for a warning alert box. This alert box indicates a warning that might need attention or carries a time limit, such as impending application deadlines.
options.alert-message: Warning! The deadline for submissions is the end of Semester 2. If you need help, please email itservicedesk@st-andrews.ac.uk.

options.option-description: Use the class alert-danger for a danger alert box. This alert box indicates a dangerous or potentially negative action such as closures or expired deadlines.
options.alert-message: Warning! The deadline for submissions has passed. If you need help please email itservicedesk@st-andrews.ac.uk.
